title: Bureau of Prisons, USA Federal Prison Population, USA, 2.28.2008
name: Bureau of Prisons, USA Federal Prison Population, USA, 2.28.2008
description: This dataset displays the inmate populations for all the Federal Prisons throughout the United States on 2.28.08. This weekly Population Report can be found on the Bureau of Prisons website at bop.gov. These facilities are positioned by their lat/lon. This dataset is updated on a weekly basis.
